allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
$content = Get-Content ''WebP→PNG変換.ps1'' -Raw -Encoding UTF8
$utf8BOM = New-Object System.Text.UTF8Encoding $true
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText((Resolve-Path ''WebP→PNG変換.ps1''), $content, $utf8BOM)
Write-Host ''ファイルをUTF-8 BOMで保存しました''
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
$content = Get-Content ''WebP→PNG変換.ps1'' -Raw -Encoding UTF8
$utf8BOM = New-Object System.Text.UTF8Encoding $true
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText((Resolve-Path ''WebP→PNG変換.ps1''), $content, $utf8BOM)
Write-Host ''UTF-8 BOMで保存完了''
")
